title: I promise this isn't stupid! - Poly Voyager Free 60+
description: Thanks to Poly for sponsoring this video. Check out the Voyager Free 60+ and the rest of their lineup using the link below:   Did you ever wish that your earbuds had a touchscreen on their case? Well these ones do. And it's.... actually not terrible?  Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 1:10 First Look 3:01 Setup and the App 7:35 Multiple connections that work?? 8:41 LABS Data 12:35 Outro
